trans-unit.source: Provides specifications for protocols and data formats for the messages used in the action supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Fornece especificações para protocolos e formatos de dados para as mensagens usadas na ação suportada pelo serviço da Web em XML.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The `OperationBinding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<operation>` element enclosed by the `<binding>` element, which in turn corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: O `OperationBinding` classe corresponde para o WSDL Web Services Description Language () `<operation>` elemento delimitados pelo `<binding>` elemento, que por sua vez correspondente para a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"> </xref> deles atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> é um membro.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> is a member of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Operations%2A> collection.
A binding of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação que atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> é um membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements specific to the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos de extensibilidade específico ao atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL Web Services Description Language (), consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Uma coleção de elementos de extensibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBindingCollection"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> instance.

trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de associação de falha.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An `OperationBinding` will be associated with exactly one `InputBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Um `OperationBinding` será associado a exatamente uma `InputBinding`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An `OperationBinding` will be associated with exactly one `OutputBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Um `OperationBinding` será associado a exatamente uma `OutputBinding`.
